description: Developed the backend infrastructure for an AI-driven feedback analysis platform, ensuring scalability and robustness.
Contributed to research on a HDL-based optimization for high-level synthesis compilers to improve hardware generation efficiency.
Teaching assistant for Computer Science, Mathematics, and Physics courses.
Conducted market research and financial analysis to support investment decisions for a student-run investment fund.
Worked on Disco, a distributed machine learning framework, focusing on optimizing data processing pipelines.
Provided consulting services for PowerPoint presentations, including design, content creation or animation.
Managed a Instagram account focused on PowerPoint tips and tricks, growing the audience to over 10,000 followers.
